name: Black Diamond Creek 20 Pack - Unisex
description: With a design derived from haul bags, this technical climbing pack is all about rugged durability and easy access. The waterproof, high denier polyester holds up when used as a haulbag or when squeezing through chimneys. Climbing specific details like a concealable rope strap and an integrated helmet and/or rope holder sets this bag up for serious cragging, sending or projecting.Fabric is haul-bag tough polyester with a TPU coating for waterproofness and durability.Top loading design stays upright for fast packing and unloading.Front flap pocket has internal zippered pockets for fast access to your GPS, topo or snacks.Tuck-away rope strap.Stowable rain hood doubles as a helmet or rope holder.
